short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoodNote for Windows - A simple Todo List Application Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize work & life with "Goodnote for Windows" Extension.

This task management extension Helps you to easily manage your daily tasks right in your browser.

Features:

1. Minimalistic interface for easy navigation.
2. Set task Start and End time to manage your workload.
3. You can set a priority for a task Using "low, Medium, High" Features
4. Easily Count your task, Completed tasks and Total tasks List
5. Undo and complete functionality Help you  to quickly organize tasks.
6. Add more to your task list as required for use.
7. Helps For Quickly organize your tasks. 

Happy organizing!
